attributes.action: Let dance studios remain open and extra curricular activities continue.
attributes.additional_details: Of our children can go to school why can’t they continue with their extra curricular activities? Children’s mental health’s are suffering massively during this pandemic and this will set them back further. Plus the dance industry has been one of the hardest hit in the pandemic with massive uncertainty and insecurity. Allow dance schools to remain open and children’s sporting activities continue.
attributes.background: I’d like the government to keep dance studios open in tier 4 and allow extra sporting activities to continue.
